column4: Tesla rival NextEV hires former Cisco tech chief Padmasree Warrior
column5: Chinese electric car company NextEV has hired Cisco Systems Inc's former tech head  Padmasree Warrior  as its chief development officer and the chief executive of its U.S. unit.
